description: Try our easy to follow Fried Pudding Dumplings With Caramel Sauce And Ice Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Fried Pudding Dumplings With Caramel Sauce And Ice Cream Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs icing sugar mixture, sifted (to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Using an 8cm round cutter, cut pastry into rounds and chill until ready to roll. Take tablespoons of Christmas pudding and form into balls (there should be about 20 balls). Dip each ball into maple syrup, and then place onto a cut pastry disc. Place a second disc of pastry over the top and use fingers to pinch pastry discs together firmly. Chill until ready to fry (see tip).

To make the caramel sauce, combine brown sugar, butter, cream and any remaining maple syrup in a small saucepan and cook on medium heat, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes or until fully incorporated. Keep warm until ready to serve.

Heat a small saucepan of oil to 180Â°C. Deep-fry pudding balls in batches for 3 minutes or until golden and pastry is cooked through. Remove and drain on paper towel. Dust with icing sugar and serve with caramel sauce and ice cream.
